DataElement.preferredName: Fertility Medication Use Duration Year Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Value to describe the number of years the patient has been using fertility drugs.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The capacity to conceive or to induce conception. It may refer to either the male or female._A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease._Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The capacity to conceive or to induce conception. It may refer to either the male or female.:biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.

Concepts.definition: The ability of an individual to produce offspring.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredDefinition: Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Duration of an event expressed in number of years._The period of time during which something continues._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The period of time during which something continues.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: The period of time during which something continues.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
